title: Ep. 516 - Your Oppression Is Imaginary
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, the country is being ripped to shreds and dismantled by people who claim they are the victims of oppression and persecution. But the oppression is imaginary. Their claims are verifiably and obviously false. So why is this really happening? Why is our society, which is freer and richer than any other society that has ever existed, coming apart at the seams? I want to spend this show analyzing these questions.

Ben's new book "How to Destroy America in Three Easy Steps" is coming out July 21st. Get your signed copy here => https://utm.io/uGvF

If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
